name: Enforcement; duties of sheriffs and police officers
text:
The sheriff and the sheriff's deputies, or any police officer, within their respective jurisdictions, shall investigate any violation, or suspected violation of, and shall enforce section 105-1. [L 1949, c 389, pt of §1(d); RL 1955, §7-13; am L 1963, c 85, §3; HRS ; gen ch 1985]  Cross References

  Sheriff, etc., see §26-14.6.
